channel.title: Skateboard on Alex's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Skateboard on Alex's personal blog

item.title: Why I Like Skateboard
item.description: It’s hard I didn’t know playing skateboard is that hard until I tried to learn it seriously. I spent couple of months during COVID learning Ollie alone, and I still haven’t master it. Ollie is just a starting trick for skateboarding, I got a long way to go. I was very confidence to start since I played roller blade for years which should give me a good balance, which should make my jumpstart easier, I underestimated it.
